caption.p: Capping enzymes inhibitors. Inhibitors structure examples. RTPase inhibitors: (I) PPi (II) PPPi (III) 6-chloropurine-ribose-5′-triphosphate. GTase inhibitors: (I) foscarnet (II) ribavirin triphosphate. MTase inhibitors: (I) sinefungin (II) dAPPMA 2′-O MTase inhibitors: (III) aurintricaboxylic acid (IV) inhibitor 7. Endonuclease inhibitors: (I) DPBA (II) Flutimide.
